Download and install the `stldata` package:

```{r}
devtools::install_github("chris-prener/stldata")
```

Open and explore the St. Louis murder date:

```{r}
library("stldata")
library("tibble")

murders <- as_data_frame(stlMurders)
stlMurders
```
